body:
Get started
-----------

```
# you can skip cloning and download the .zip  or .tar.gz archive instead
git clone git://github.com/robokaso/Groovy-Spring-Batch-Template.git gsb
cd gsb

./gradlew run      # execute the sample job
./gradlew check    # run tests and generate reports
./gradlew distZip  # package the project for distribution 
```

Learn more
----------

[Documentation](https://github.com/robokaso/Groovy-Spring-Batch-Template#readme)

[Issue tracker](https://github.com/robokaso/Groovy-Spring-Batch-Template/issues)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/robokaso/Groovy-Spring-Batch-Template.png)](https://travis-ci.org/robokaso/Groovy-Spring-Batch-Template)

name: Groovy Spring Batch Template
tagline: Kickstart your batch development with Groovy
